quasar2.name: v-close-popup
quasar2.description: This directive is a helper when dealing with QDialog and QMenu components. When attached to a DOM element or component then that component will close the QDialog or QMenu (whichever is first parent) when clicked/tapped.
quasar2.description_zh: 此指令在处理 QDialog 和 QMenu 组件时是一个帮助程序。当附加到 DOM 元素或组件时，该组件将在单击/点击时关闭 QDialog 或 QMenu（以第一个父项为准）。

quasar2.name: v-intersection
quasar2.description: “Intersection” is a Quasar directive that enables a method to be called when the user scrolls and the DOM element (or component) that it is applied to comes into or out of the viewport.
quasar2.description_zh: “Intersection” 是一个 Quasar 指令，它允许在用户滚动并且应用它的 DOM 元素（或组件）进入或退出视口时调用方法。

quasar2.name: v-ripple
quasar2.description: Material Ripple effect can easily be added to any DOM element (or component) through the v-ripple Quasar directive.
quasar2.description_zh: 材质涟漪效果可以通过 v-ripple Quasar 指令轻松添加到任何 DOM 元素（或组件）中。

params.name: early
params.description_zh: 在用户交互时尽早/立即触发

params.name: stop
params.description_zh: 停止点击/触摸事件传播

params.name: center
params.description: Ripple starts from the absolute center

params.name: color
params.description: Color name from Quasar Color Palette; Overrides default dynamic color
params.description_zh: 来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称;覆盖默认动态颜色

params.name: keyCodes
params.description: List of keyCode that should trigger the ripple
params.description_zh: 应触发涟漪的 keyCode 列表

quasar2.name: v-mutation
quasar2.description: “Mutation” is a Quasar directive that provides the ability to watch for changes being made to the DOM tree and call a method when these are triggered.
quasar2.description_zh: “Mutation” 是一个 Quasar 指令，它提供了监视对 DOM 树所做的更改并在触发这些更改时调用方法的能力。

quasar2.name: v-morph
quasar2.description: “Morph” is a Quasar directive that provides the ability to morph DOM elements between two states.
quasar2.description_zh: “Morph” 是一个 Quasar 指令，它提供了在两个状态之间变形 DOM 元素的能力。

quasar2.name: v-scroll
quasar2.description: This is a Vue directive which takes one parameter (a Function) and fires when user scrolls the page containing that DOM node.
quasar2.description_zh: 这是一个 Vue 指令，它接受一个参数（一个 Function），并在用户滚动包含该 DOM 节点的页面时触发。

quasar2.name: v-scroll-fire
quasar2.description: “Scroll Fire” is a directive that enables a method to be called (once and only once) when the user scrolls current page and the DOM element (or component) that it is applied to comes into the viewport.
quasar2.description_zh: “Scroll Fire” 是一个指令，当用户滚动当前页面并且应用该方法的 DOM 元素（或组件）进入视区时，可以调用方法（一次且仅一次）。

quasar2.name: v-touch-hold
quasar2.description: Quasar offers full-featured Vue directives that can totally replace libraries like Hammerjs: v-touch-pan, v-touch-swipe, v-touch-hold and even v-touch-repeat.
quasar2.description_zh: Quasar 提供了功能齐全的 Vue 指令，可以完全取代 Hammerjs 等库：v-touch-pan、v-touch-swipe、v-touch-hold 甚至 v-touch-repeat。

quasar2.name: v-touch-pan
quasar2.description: Quasar offers full-featured Vue directives that can totally replace libraries like Hammerjs: v-touch-pan, v-touch-swipe, v-touch-hold and even v-touch-repeat.
quasar2.description_zh: Quasar 提供了功能齐全的 Vue 指令，可以完全取代 Hammerjs 等库：v-touch-pan、v-touch-swipe、v-touch-hold 甚至 v-touch-repeat。

quasar2.name: v-touch-repeat
quasar2.description: Quasar offers full-featured Vue directives that can totally replace libraries like Hammerjs: v-touch-pan, v-touch-swipe, v-touch-hold and even v-touch-repeat.
quasar2.description_zh: Quasar 提供了功能齐全的 Vue 指令，可以完全取代 Hammerjs 等库：v-touch-pan、v-touch-swipe、v-touch-hold 甚至 v-touch-repeat。

quasar2.name: v-touch-swipe
quasar2.description: Quasar offers full-featured Vue directives that can totally replace libraries like Hammerjs: v-touch-pan, v-touch-swipe, v-touch-hold and even v-touch-repeat.
quasar2.description_zh: Quasar 提供了功能齐全的 Vue 指令，可以完全取代 Hammerjs 等库：v-touch-pan、v-touch-swipe、v-touch-hold 甚至 v-touch-repeat。
